page.description: Define the in-control buttons. For example, there might be a 'Clear button' inside a textbox to allow you to remove all of the text in the control in one go. A filter button can also be added, as can a 'Search' button, or any customized button that you might want. One a button in defined there are several properties that appear to aid in its definition:

figure.title: The In-control buttons definition opens this builder.
